channel.title: Staff meeting - READ
channel.description:
I'd like to get another staff meeting going, but this time I want to try a different take on a staff meeting. This time instead of the conventional IRC meeting I'd like to have a voice based communication meeting.
So if you don't have a mic you can contribute in chat :)
At the moment I'm not sure what you guys would want to use, either skype, or mumble. I have serious issues on mumble in terms of transmission of what I'm saying. I basically sounds like I'm speaking in slow motion half of the time but if you all want to use it then so be it.
Things tend to get done much easier when we're actually talking, so if you can speak, then please do. It doesn't matter how old you are, how good your English is and what not. I'm 16 and from England so of course my voice isn't perfect, and it might be a bit awkward. That stuff just happens.
I'd like everyone to work out a time if they can.

item.title: Staff meeting - READ
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

Mumble messes up on me too (seems to be a pattern) I still say teamspeak is awesome though for holding meetings, etc. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Staff meeting - READ
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It wasn’t a conventional IRC meeting, so recording what was said exactly was hard to do. So no, nobody wrote down what everyone said via mic.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Did anybody record a log at the meeting? I couldn’t stay online at the time unfortunately.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff meeting - READ
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Quite an interesting meeting

I feel we covered quite a lot of topics, and had some interesting things happen.

item.title: Staff meeting - READ

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

My mistake, I’m loosing what day it is, it’s today.

Read full topic

item.title: Staff meeting - READ
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Tom:

It’s Sunday today, sorry for the short notice, I’ve been very very busy with educational stuff but if anyone can come on between 5PM-12PM GMT to #moparcraft-staff for a start. Attendance is very important.

I don’t get you, today’s Friday… Or do you mean it’s on Sunday?

Read full topic
